title: Bug 7330 - Make more actions available on text selection
description: I could not find the action 'Add Javadoc Comment' until I switched to the Outline view. Currently, the actions are distributed randomly, and it is not clear to users why some actions are in the context menu and some are not. All actions must be reachable from the editor. It is not acceptable to force users to switch the view.
OB: The 'Add Javadoc Comment' action is missing from the context menu when selecting text.
EB: The 'Add Javadoc Comment' action should be available in the context menu when selecting text.
SR:
1. Open the editor.
2. Select some text.
3. Right-click on the selected text to open the context menu.
4. Verify that the 'Add Javadoc Comment' action is present in the context menu.
